title: [Gameplay] Renekton's W.
body: well i wanted to try the new renekton today and i found this bug with his W , just with the poolparty skin, no bubbles when you press W but you still can hear the sound of it.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're working on a fix!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=lZnhWfys,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-28T17:40:33.569+0000)
>
> Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're working on a fix!

Hi again Riot Katey, the bug is still here btw {{champion:58}}
Yup, we're aware! Unfortunately, not every bug report is fixed in the next patch, especially some of the smaller issues. I've gone ahead and brought it to the team's attention, though. :]
They should be ya know. That'd be really awesome though, all bugs get fixed in the next patch :O Would be good for your "Best game company in the World" title.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=lZnhWfys,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-13T03:12:59.582+0000)
>
> Yup, we're aware! Unfortunately, not every bug report is fixed in the next patch, especially some of the smaller issues. I've gone ahead and brought it to the team's attention, though. :]

Thank you =]
2 months Later ... still no bubbles. Why you guys fixed gragas Q sound in ESQ skin and not rene bubbles ?

Wow I sure got a kick from reading this through the Red Tracker

Just started imagining the picture of someone telling a customer support agent:
"Hey I bought this phone for the bubbles screensaver! Now the bubbles are gone but there are still bubble sounds! I want a refund!"

made me lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Cardi,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=lZnhWfys,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-13T03:21:08.734+0000)
>
> Wow I sure got a kick from reading this through the Red Tracker
> 
> Just started imagining the picture of someone telling a customer support agent:
> "Hey I bought this phone for the bubbles screensaver! Now the bubbles are gone but there are still bubble sounds! I want a refund!"
> 
> made me lol.

Haha you made me laugh sir XD " where is my bubbles !! I want my bubbles BACK NOW "
